A

addAnimation(AppObject) - Method in class com.codecool.core.App
Adds animation to app.
addAnimations(List<AppObject>) - Method in class com.codecool.core.App
Adds animations to app.
addAppObject(AppObject) - Method in class com.codecool.core.App
Adds appObject to app.
addAppObjects(List<AppObject>) - Method in class com.codecool.core.App
Adds appObjects to app.
Animation - Class in com.codecool.core.animation
Implements animation functionality by the Animation.defineFrames() so every class that extends it has to use the method to define Animation.frames which will represent the particular frames of the animation.
Animation(int, int, App, boolean) - Constructor for class com.codecool.core.animation.Animation
Constructs an Animation.
App - Class in com.codecool.core
Implements an app functionality, updates app objects then renders them on the terminal screen.
App(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class com.codecool.core.App
Constructs an App with the specified params.
App(int, int, boolean, int) - Constructor for class com.codecool.core.App
Constructs an App with the specified params.
app - Variable in class com.codecool.core.AppObject
A reference of the application host
applyForAddition(E) - Method in class com.codecool.core.buffer.Buffer
Adds object to the Buffer, with the tag ADD
applyForAddition(List<E>) - Method in class com.codecool.core.buffer.Buffer
Adds multiple objects to the Buffer, with the tag ADD
applyForRemoval(E) - Method in class com.codecool.core.buffer.Buffer
Adds object to the Buffer, with the tag REMOVE
applyForRemoval(List<E>) - Method in class com.codecool.core.buffer.Buffer
Adds multiple objects to the Buffer, with the tag REMOVE
AppObject - Class in com.codecool.core
It's represents an object in the app, which can be drawn in the terminal and updated in every frame.
AppObject(int, int, char[][], App) - Constructor for class com.codecool.core.AppObject
Constructs an AppObject.

B

Buffer<E extends Bufferable> - Class in com.codecool.core.buffer
This class implements a buffer what can be used in cases when it's not possible to add/remove objects to/from a list immediately.
Buffer(List<E>) - Constructor for class com.codecool.core.buffer.Buffer
Constructs a Buffer with the specified target.
Bufferable - Interface in com.codecool.core.buffer
It's provide necessary methods for Buffer's applyFor*() and process() methods
BufferTag - Enum in com.codecool.core.buffer
It is a util like class to support Buffer.

com.codecool.core - package com.codecool.core
 
com.codecool.core.animation - package com.codecool.core.animation
 
com.codecool.core.buffer - package com.codecool.core.buffer
 
com.codecool.core.render - package com.codecool.core.render
 

D

defineFrames() - Method in class com.codecool.core.animation.Animation
This where the user of this class have to define Animation.frames

F

frames - Variable in class com.codecool.core.animation.Animation
You can think of this as your sequence of pictures which will played when your Animation added to the app.
FramesNotDefined - Exception in com.codecool.core.animation
Custom exception in case Animation.defineFrames() not used properly and Animation.frames not defined.

P

process() - Method in class com.codecool.core.buffer.Buffer
Adds/Removes objects found in Buffer.elements from/to Buffer.target based on them BufferTag, and then clears the Buffer.

render() - Method in class com.codecool.core.render.View
This is where the render takes place.
Renderable - Interface in com.codecool.core.render
Provides interface for any object which is liked to be rendered by View
RenderData - Class in com.codecool.core.render
Represents the data that is needed to an object to be rendered by the App.
RenderData(int, int, char[][]) - Constructor for class com.codecool.core.render.RenderData
Constructs a RenderData.
renderSymbols - Variable in class com.codecool.core.AppObject
Characters that will be represent the object on the screen.
renderSymbols - Variable in class com.codecool.core.render.RenderData
sybols that represents an AppObject on the screen.

T

tagName - Variable in class com.codecool.core.AppObject
It can be used to get AppObject(s) from the host by the App.getAppObject(s)ByTagName() It is not forced to be uniq.

U

update() - Method in class com.codecool.core.animation.Animation
Goes through the frames, it is updating the Animation.frameCounter in every update, and when reaches the end acts based on Animation.isLooping and starts over, or removes the animation from the host app.
update() - Method in class com.codecool.core.AppObject
This is an important method.

V

valueOf(String) - Static method in enum com.codecool.core.buffer.BufferTag
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
values() - Static method in enum com.codecool.core.buffer.BufferTag
Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
View<T extends Renderable> - Class in com.codecool.core.render
Abstracts away the render functionality for app.
View(int, int, List<T>, List<T>, int) - Constructor for class com.codecool.core.render.View
Constructs a View with the specified params.

X
